introduction_paragraph1: Currently a 3rd year student in computer science at Dawson College.
introduction_paragraph2: I am fluent in English, French, and Vietnamese. My areas of interest include backend and frontend development. I am a software developer with a passion for innovative software solutions. Seeking opportunities to enhance technical skills and contribute to challenging projects.
projects_intro: Explore some of my projects below. Feel free to check!
workout_recipe_description: A gym recipe GUI application built with AvaloniaUI so that users can create their recipe and show it to other users on the same platform.
medical_app_description: A Flask-based medical web application with RESTful APIs that allows users to take appointments and doctors had privileges that could allow them to accept or deny the appointment.
book_reading_app_description: A modern Android application for book enthusiasts, built with Jetpack Compose and following Material Design principles.
us_counties_crime_title: US Counties Crime Analysis App React-NodeJs-Express-MongoDb-CSS
us_counties_crime_description: A data visualization application designed to analyze crime data in conjunction with economic and demographic factors across US counties by using the MERN stack.
work_experience_summary: Here is a summary of my work experience:
work_experience_description: Developed and maintained front-end features using React and Tailwind. Collaborated with colleagues in Agile scrum.
contact_message: Feel free to reach out if you want to build something together, have a question, or just want to connect.
